txt.en:
You've discovered a Mustering Horn which allows you to bring members of your fellowship immediately to your location. Using a Mustering Horn requires a travelling ration from both the user and the target to be mustered.

No player may be mustered more than once every 30 minutes and must be of a high enough level for the area they are being mustered to.

Look for more Mustering Horns at campsites like this one across Middle-Earth.
